item.title: Download Word速 Document Processing C# Library | Aspose.Words
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.Words for Word速 Document Processing Open NuGet Package Manager within the Microsoft Visual Studio®, search for Aspose.Words and install. You may also use the following command within the Package Manager Console. For the detailed instructions please visit the Installation documentation page. Release Notes Download PM> Install-Package Aspose.Words   Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License

item.title: Aspose.Words | Java Library to Process Document Formats
item.description: Java API for Various Document Formats Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.Words for Java is an advanced Java Word processing API that enables you to perform a great range of document processing tasks directly within your Java applications. Aspose.Words for Java API supports processing word (DOC, DOCX, OOXML, RTF) HTML, OpenDocument, PDF, EPUB, XPS, SWF and all image formats.

item.title: Download C++ DLL to Process Word速 Documents | Aspose.Words
item.description: Support Forum Download C++ Library for Word速 Document Processing Open NuGet Package Manager within the Microsoft Visual Studio®, search for Aspose.Words.Cpp and install. You may also use the following command within the Package Manager Console. For the detailed instructions please visit the Installation documentation page. Release Notes Download PM> Install-Package Aspose.Words.Cpp   Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA

item.title: Glyph Outlines Parsing for CFF Fonts API for C# ASP.NET Apps
item.description: Aspose.Words for .NET 22.7 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 94.75MB Date Added: 4/7/2022 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/words/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-words-for-net-22-7-release-notes/ DescriptionIt contains Aspose.Words for .NET 22.7 release File Details Glyph Outlines Parsing for OpenType (CFF) Fonts This API version offers our own mechanism of parsing glyph outlines for OpenType Compact Font Format (CFF) fonts. DATABASE Fields Support Added support of the DATABASE fields.

item.title: Import Export AZW3 Kindle Format 8 (KF8) API C# ASP.NET Apps
item.description: Aspose.Words for .NET 22.8 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 95.34MB Date Added: 2/8/2022 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/words/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-words-for-net-22-8-release-notes/ DescriptionIt contains Aspose.Words for .NET 22.8 MSI installer. File Details AZW3 (KF8) Format Import/Export Support This version of the API introduces the ability to import and export the AZW3, a.k.a. Kindle Format 8 (KF8) eBook format. Amazon’s KF8 (.azw3) is the next generation file format of Kindle eReaders.

item.title: Reduce PDF Size by Caching Shapes API for C#, ASP.NET Apps
item.description: Aspose.Words for .NET 22.9 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 83.19MB Date Added: 5/9/2022 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/words/net/release-notes/2022/aspose-words-for-net-22-9-release-notes/ DescriptionIt contains Aspose.Words for .NET 22.9 MSI installer. File Details Cache Header / Footer Shapes to Reduce PDF Size This API release has the ability to cache the header and footer shapes and reduce the output PDF file size. Create Group Structured Document Tags at Row Level With this API version now you have the option to create the structured document tags (SDT) as a child of a Table node among table rows.

item.title: Docx Styling API: Theme, Fill, Tint, Shade | C# .NET App API
item.description: Aspose.Words for .NET 23.3 Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 85.54MB Date Added: 6/3/2023 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/words/net/release-notes/2023/aspose-words-for-net-23-3-release-notes/ DescriptionIt contains Aspose.Words for .NET 23.3 MSI installer. File Details Enhanced Fill Class with Theme Colors and Tint/Shade Introducing the following properties in the Fill class: ForeThemeColor: Gets or sets the foreground color for the fill BackThemeColor: Gets or sets the background color for the fill ForeTintAndShade: Gets or sets the value that lightness or darkness of the foreground color BackTintAndShade: Gets or sets the value that lightness or darkness of the background color Easily manage and control the document styling by setting the theme colors, fill colors, tint and shade, using this new functionality in the API.

File Details Citation and Bibliography Field Support The Document.UpdateFields, Range.UpdateFields or Field.Update methods can be used to update the newly introduced CITATION and BIBLIOGRAPHY fields. Seamlessly integrate citation and bibliography fields into your documents to enhance the end-user experience of your academic writing and referencing Apps.

item.title: Aspose.Words 23.8 | Process Document Formats via Java API
item.description: Java API for Various Document Formats Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License Aspose.Words for Java is an advanced Java Word processing API that enables you to perform a great range of document processing tasks directly within your Java applications. Aspose.Words for Java API supports processing word (DOC, DOCX, OOXML, RTF) HTML, OpenDocument, PDF, EPUB, XPS, SWF and all image formats.
